name: Amanda Folson
bio: From humble beginnings as a PHP4 web developer in grade school, Amanda worked as a Developer Relations Manager at Nexmo where she gets to share her passion for technology and education with others. In addition to consuming APIs and IPAs, she currently serves as a co-host for the PHPTownHall Podcast and is involved in Open Sourcing Mental Illness. In her spare time youâ€™ll find her in a hammock with a guitar.
